title: I want my keyfragments. I haven't gotten one in 17daysssssssssssssss

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not 100% sure on this new hextech system, however my understanding is as follows.

* Key fragments drop rarely.
* Every time a key fragment drops for you, the drop rate decreases even more until the end of the month.

Have you had any key fragment drops this month?
